jdbcService.sql: select a.id, a.created, a.modified, a.name, a.audit, a.component_id from actions a join action_roles ar on a.id = ar.action_id join roles r on ar.role_id = r.id join group_roles gr on gr.role_id = r.id join groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join user_groups ug on ug.group_id = g.id join users u on u.id = ug.user_id where u.alias = :alias and gr.node_id is null
